title: [Celebrating the Site's Industrial Life]
brief_description: Originally established for the storing and handling of commercial explosives, the reserve is one of Altona’s few intact examples of its rich industrial history. This animation brings to life the story of explosives, the working life of the Truganina Explosives Reserve and its place in the history of Melbourne’s western region.
